Green sea turtles
can stay under water for up to five hours.

Leatherback sea turtles
have been known to
dive as deep as
1,000 feet!

Sea turtles get their water from food so they
can live in salt water.

If a sea turtle looks
like he’s crying, he’s
shedding excess salt.

Sea turtles have existed for over
150 million years.

Sea turtles only come
to land to lay eggs.

Sea turtles cannot pull
their head and flippers into their shells.

Sea turtles will return
to the place of their
birth to nest.

Only one in 1,000 will make it to adulthood.

Sea turtles are in every ocean except the
Arctic Ocean.
